suncertify.db
Class Database

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--suncertify.db.Database
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataInterface, java.rmi.Remote
public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataInterface

This class implements the basic services for local database. It uses the adapter pattern for holding a reference to suncertify.db.Data class. This implementation includes the same public methods as suncertify.db.Data class

Version:
1.2 06-Apr-2003
Author:
Francisco Carlos

close

public void close()
Closes the connection to database If the client-side application is startup in the local mode, then just only closes the dababase. If the client-side application is startup in the remote mode, then unlock all records locked previous for that clients

Specified by:
close in interface DataInterface

lock in interface DataInterface
